content.detailedDescription:
First of all, i have 6 witnesses to this! my fiance', age 31, my sister, age 32, her 2 son's, ages 14 and 8, and her son's friends, ages 14.
no drinking or drugs involved!
on sunday, may 25th at approximately 11:30 p.M.(it could have been a bit earlier, but we were so excited about it), we were all out in the back, burning some wood, and looking at the stars.  we had seen about 4 shooting stars, and about 3 satellites orbiting that night.  my sister was looking towards the west(a little ways to the left of the big dipper), and she noticed what we thought was another satellite.
everyone found it and began to look at it for a second.  i saw that the light was getting brighter, and i mentioned it.  everyone was saying "oh my gosh, it is!"  next thing you know, it looked as if a light came out from underneath, and shined a huge spotlight.  keep in mind, it was far enough to look as if it was a satellite, so there wasn't any rays we could see from the ufo.  it shined for about 5 seconds, then as it started to dim again, the ufo shot quickly to the right, then faded away.
it was not a military plane, because nothing we have in the military does that.  and it was not a helicopter because it was way to high.
all my life, i have told people "you can't believe that we are the only beings in either this universe or another?  they are way more advanced than we are.  whatever they are!"  my sister is a true believer too, and we were so amazed by what we saw, we both can't stop thinking about it.
what worries me is that with all of the sightings that have happened this year, the government really needs to let us know what is going on, so that if something was to happen, we will be prepared.
content.summary: A star-like object shined a spotlight down, then took off and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and  myself were sitting out on his dock on lost lake in groton, mass. trying to pick out constellations and satellites. as an avid skywatcher and being ex-military i am pretty familiar with sky-borne objects one is likely to see in the both day and night. with orion at our 12 o'clock position i picked up an object at roughly the 9 o'clock, heading to the 12, and pointed it out. it appeared to be a satellite - a dot of light - however it was not where you would expect one with respect to the horizon; it seemed lower. within seconds it became very bright, not a sudden flash but a quick build. it continued to moving, dimmed, returned to original state and then faded off. at no time were trails, flashing, or blinking observed.
our own reactions to it were surprise. given the myriad of possiblities, especially with night observations, it was, as we both agreed, something we'd not ever seen before. now, this is not quite true as i had observed exactly the same type of thing about a week prior from my home. 

also, approx. a month before that i observed a very bright light descend straight down from its position in the sky. by that i mean it did not behave like an aircraft in normal flight. the sky to the back of my home is quite busy in terms of flight paths and i am very familiar with them and the behaviors of the aircraft so my initial reaction while watching it fall/descend was that a plane was in trouble. it came down straight as an arrow for several seconds until lower clouds suddenly obscured my view of it. night sky was relatively clear with some lower cloud cover. i have observed meteorites, space junk, over time shooting through the night sky and it did not have any of the many characteristics i have observed. the following day there were no reports of a plane going down.
content.summary: Clear starry night, dimly illuminated object crossing sky suddenly became very bright forseveral seconds, dimmed down then disappeared away.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at a small park on the edge of lake jackson, looking up at the blue sky and few clouds and noticing the floaters in my aging eyesight when i saw a star.  thought that was pretty neat as i don't often see stars until nearer to dusk.  i realized it was moving - almost imperceptively - but moving all the same.  i was intrigued and turned on my car to see the time.  7:26 pm.  i watched for another 20 minutes and watched this "star" move about 30 degrees to the north and east, almost straight above me.  called my husband who drove his car to my location.  he saw it, said cool, and started investigating the grounds.  he would check in with me every 5 minutes to see where it had moved.  intensity of the light never really changed and the movement was so slight that you wouldn't notice it moving unless you were keeping track of it.  when initially seen, i was looking ssw. over the 90 minutes it was visible, it moved over a portion of the sky that a place mat would cover if held at arms length.  during the sighting a few high flying jets went over.  i couldn't tell whether the light was at a higher or lower altitude than these jets but my feeling was it was in the upper atmosphere.  i called my sister and brother in law who live a few miles away and they both saw the 'star' from their location but were uninterested in it moving.  at about 8:50 pm it was located further west than when first seen and it just winked out - i believe due to the setting sun.  made me realize the 'star' was not giving off its own light, but was reflecting light.  during the show, i also called my nephew who works for jpl in pasadena, but couldn't reach him.  he called me later and said it could be a weather balloon, a spy plane, or some rocket that shoots straight up then unloads its cargo and comes right back down.  none of those sounded right to me, but who knows?  i didn't have a camera or binoculars and didn't think to ask my husband to bring them.  i tried taking cell phone pic but of course nothing showed up.  it was a great 24th anniversary present.  curious if anyone else saw this?
content.summary: Star against blue sky moving around for 90 minutes

 i didn't have a camera or binoculars and didn't think to ask my husband to bring them.  i tried taking cell phone pic but of course nothing showed up.  it was a great 24th anniversary present.  curious if anyone else saw this?
content.summary: Star against blue sky moving around for 90 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Always like going out on my deck in back of my house on cool clear nights to relax and watch for falling stars. and i saw a falling star about 12:05 am and then 5 mins latter i saw the 3 objects in a triangle formation at a very high altitude.The sighting lasted about 20 to 25 sec..Just thought i would report this sighting in case anyone else in the area seen the same thing. it just could have been satellite,s its just that i never have seen them in a perfect formation like that. thanks for your time.
content.summary: 3 objects in a triangle formation at very slow speed going east to west then they just vanished at 12 oclock high.

content.detailedDescription:
Ovni en concierto de megadeth, valencia, estado carabobo, venezuela.
hola, ayer 25/05 fui a ver a megadeth en la ciudad de valencia, estado carabobo en venezuela, y tome algunas fotos, entre ellas una que aparecen dos objetos en el aire, no identificados, que al tomar la foto no me di cuenta que estaban alli, y no vi pasar ni helicopteros ni nada por el estilo por alli ese dia.. lo que si vi fueron loros y un gavilan, pero muy cerca y en fin, lo que parece son dos ovnis objeto volador no identificado, me di cuanta cuando las baje a la computadora, les envio las fotos las cuales tome con mi celular lg. saludos ivan.
content.summary: Ovni en concierto de megadeth, valencia, estado carabobo

content.detailedDescription:
Ovni en concierto de megadeth, valencia, estado carabobo, venezuela.
hola, ayer 25/05 fui a ver a megadeth en la ciudad de valencia, estado carabobo en venezuela, y tome algunas fotos, entre ellas una que aparecen dos objetos en el aire, no identificados, que al tomar la foto no me di cuenta que estaban alli, y no vi pasar ni helicopteros ni nada por el estilo por alli ese dia.. lo que si vi fueron loros y un gavilan, pero muy cerca y en fin, lo que parece son dos ovnis objeto volador no identificado, me di cuanta cuando las baje a la computadora, les envio las fotos. saludos ivan.
content.summary: Ovni en concierto de megadeth, valencia, venezuela

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my backyard, and i looked up and noticed a white light,
that looked like a very very bright star travelling northward in sky very slowly and in a straight line. the funny thing about it was that it would dim to the point where it was out, and then it would return to full brightness.. it lasted for about 20 seconds.. i thought at first it was a shooting star, but shooting stars usually travel faster through the sky, and they don't usually turn back on again.. this one was moving very slow, and it dimmed completely out in about 6-8 seconds, and then return to full brightness.. it did this 3 times, and it didn't return to full brightness again. i waited and watch for a little longer and nothing else happened. i checked for shower activity at this time of year, and i don't see any forecasts for shooting star activity. i wanted to post this in case there are any other reports of strange activity in the sky on this night in arizona.. thank you.
content.summary: Bright white light like a star but moving

content.detailedDescription: This was sitting in the sky on 2-27-08  around 6:00pm. after 1/2 hour i lost track of it. not sure what it is. could this be an experimental sky camera or what? i'll keep my eyes open and camera ready, just incase i see anything else in near future. i'm also attaching a second sighting.
content.summary: not shure wha this is.

content.detailedDescription:
we just came home from a walk with our young son.  while my husband was unlocking the front door, i happened to look up across the street, which would be facing east, towards milwaukee.  i could see a bright silver object far off, high in the sky.  i could only see it when the sun hit it just right.  i called to my husband, and he also saw it.  he had on polarized sunglasses, and could see it very well. i wondered for a second if it could possibly be a bird and just be closer than it appeared, but there was no way it was a bird.  it was shiny, metallic, perfectly round, and moved rapidly back and forth.  it was very far away. we watched it move back and forth and in circles for about a minute.  then it moved off very quickly down, away, and to the south.  we could see it well as it moved off, because the sun (behind us) was hitting it so well. 
happened at about 5:49 p.M. and last about two minutes.
our reaction was just, kind of,- "wow.  we just saw a ufo. crazy."
we are not crazy, we really did just see this.
thanks.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Silver, bright

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were outside on our back patio at approx 8:30 in the evening.  our place is in the approach path for seatac and i was watching the planes approach from the north.  i look almost straight up and that is when i saw the object.  it was very high, far above the flight paths of the transpacific flights we see from time to time.  this was a large black triangular object that did not move for approx ten minutes.  it stayed staionary.  i'd been looking at it for a few minutes when my wife asked me what i was looking at.  i asked her if the could see it, and if it was moving.  she said she could see it and that it was not moving.  we watched the object for about ten minutes and it then began to move to the south west.  the rate at which it moved we very very slow.  based on the height at which the object was it must have been very large, at least the size of a 737.  

feel free to contact me via email.

thank you,

omar reyes
content.summary: Large black triangle

content.detailedDescription: Was at a red light on kempsville rd. in virginia beach. at first the "balls" looked like they might be from a fire or something. there was no fire around. they were bright as heck! 5 circles, or balls of very bright light, that went from large to small in size. they came across my windshield then took straight off in the sky. maybe the size of dish plates, hard to tell. there is no explanation of what they were!  weird!
content.summary: 5 bright oribs of light, varying in size, shot across the road, very bright!

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting around our fire pit in backyard with my two sons, 8 and 13.  we had just sat down, facing north, and were looking at the big dipper which was almost right above us when i noticed a very bright white star-like object traveling west to east about the same speed as a 35000 ft airliner.  

we first thought it might have been a jet, but we see jets go over our house all of the time as we are right under a flight pattern to o'hare which is about 30 miles southeast from us.  we also see airliners flying at 35000 ft and above going cross-country all of the time.  whenever we have seen a jet, we always see the flashing lights, so this was unlike anything we have seen before.  there was no contrail in the sky and no flashing lights and it looked like a large bright planet just traversing the sky in a straight line.  we do see satellites go over quite often, but never west to east and nowhere near as bright as this one.  it was north of us and at an angle in the sky that we would rarely be able to see a satellite (need to be almost right under those), and it was very bright.  not far behind the object was a passneger jetliner, easily identifiable, with contrail and the lights on both wings.  both moved at about the same speed.

the object just disappeared over the horizon to the south and east of us, still very bright and traveling at a constant speed.

we do not feel that it was a jet, but perhaps a low-orbit satellite or the space station; but we have not been able to confirm yet what man-made object, if any, would have been in this area yet.
content.summary: West to east steady travel, brighter than venus or satellites, no blinking lights, white in color

content.detailedDescription:
I saw, for the first time, a show on "rods" on the history channel tonight; i had never even heard of them before tonight.

but upon seeing this show, i am very intrigued and realized that i had my own picture of one -- something i had never given much thought. but in the show, one of the most compelling arguments for their existence was the video filmed in a cave where there are rods, insects and birds all in the same shot.

well, i have a photograph of a hummingbird eating at a feeder with a "rod" shooting across the image, taken from the deck of my grandparents' house... the hummingbird is nearly crystal clear, and the rod is... well, a rod. i did not think anything of it at first; i had not heard of "rods" before, and it just looked like something was coming out of the hummingbird.

i do not vividly recall seeing the rod with my bare eyes, but i cannot say that i didn't with certainty, as it was nearly two years ago now.

please get back to me as to whether or not this can help and also what you think. the image can be found on my web site, here: http://techssupport.Org/rod.Jpg

the image was taken with a canon powershot sd500 with a shutter speed of 1/20 sec.

again, i hope this can be of help.
content.summary: Sighting of a "rod"

content.detailedDescription: It was just a few minutes ago and it was incredible!! i watched and i could see the stars it passed but they slightly distorted i think it was a big triangle shaped craft but huge!! or 3 lights in formation i could not be certain. this is not the only event i have witnessed since moving back to california i have been reluctant to report them as it was not my first sighting i have reported.. i can���t stop looking up!! i also seen about a month ago a huge surfboard shaped light flying at a 45 degree angle (it looked from my few) flying from out over the ocean towards the east.. i swear i am not lying or crazy or on meds of any kind
content.summary: 3 star like lights moving in formation i think

content.detailedDescription: I was in the swimming pool at night with great weather conditions and great visibility no clouds just stars,the lights of the pool were on.I was with two nieghbors at the time and i was swimming across the middle of the pool slowly relaxing backstroke gazing at the stars when i saw in my periphrial vision directly south of me what i thought was a hawk or owl aproaching quickly toward us overhead appox 100 yards 30 feet up i was suprised to even realize i noticed it just then it object slowed as it approached the pool and flew directly overhead at a very slow rate of speed and so low the blue light reflecting from the bottom of the pool with the waters reflective ripples illuminating the craft only 30 feet above me.I was in awe and just stood erect with my mouth open unable speak or take my eyes off this beautiful craft.I soaked it all in it is burned in my memory.The craft slowly moved overhead as if it was letting me admire it,it resembled a hexagonal dumbell flat black in color the black area barely reflecting the water/light but the 2 ends of the craft the hexs were reflective gold and looked like material similar to what nasa uses on its satellites.No windows or lights,no sound,just the wind as it glided over as glider sounds,but this craft seemed totally the opposite of aerodynamic,and also seemed too small for human occupant/operator unless they were seated in the hexs on the ends.It then as it was around 40 yards past me it accelarated away in the same fashion it approached.I then looked over to see if my neighbors had witnessed the event only to see them making out oblivious to the event they missed out on.I said nothing and left the pool.The craft was approx 20 feet wide 10 feet long 6 feet thick
content.summary: Very close encounter

content.detailedDescription: Looking towards the south almost overhead and witnessed what at first glance were airplane lights. however i kept watching and it turned into a fantastic display of several flashing lights almost like fireflies dancing around in the sky. they would flash and switch position very rapidly, sometimes making right and left sharp turns. the lights were not a steady flash but random flickering. this appeared to be several objects (5-7) and their movement did not have any set pattern as to where they were going or doing, again reminded me of fireflies but instead of an orange hue, their appeared white with slight tint of green. about 35 minutes of activity...Fantastic! my wife also witnessed this for about 10 minutes but decided to go back to bed. she stated that it was interesting and had no idea as to what they may be. in the end they just stopped. in short, i feel really good about what i saw and i hope to see them again. this was my first ufo sighting.
content.summary: Lots of flahing lights

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard by the outdoor fire pit. i was looking up at the night sky.  i saw  2 shooting stars (meteorites)and continued to look around the sky for more. i noticed a point of light that i thought was moving but not quite sure.  then i noticed two more points of light traveling along with the first one.  then i noticed they were  in the shape of a triangle moving together from north to south slowly. they moved without any sound for no more than 2-3 minutes and went out of sight due to trees in the yard obstructing my view. the points of light always moved together and never altered size or shape.  i never saw any flashing lights and i am extremely puzzled as to what it could have been.
content.summary: Three points of light in the form of a triangle moving north to south

content.detailedDescription:
set video camera to capture lighting during a bbq. we just left it and let it record. upon reviewing footage there was a definite object in the air going down ward. the object did change color and shape various times.
 it went from white  cigar shape or (like a sausage dog)with varies black circles around it to a round oblonged object with a different color and a decrease in the black objects around it. at one part it appeared triangular bright yellowish orange and went on to as if someone was swimming in the sky at this point a light purple at the end of footage it was ascending back upward and was white. 
    the video is a must see it took my breath away and made me excited and i will be the first to say i am a skeptic. it is what it is a ufo.
  ps would like to place video on internet but do not know how to do that.
 
    i am ecstatic.
content.shape: Cigar,  Circle,  Disc,  Flash,  Triangle,  Other
content.summary: Filming lighting storm

content.detailedDescription:
Daily democrat-letters to the editor

i had a sighting in june 1981 from the back yard of my home.  i was enlisted in the air force for 4 years.  i retire last year, after 19 years of civilian service.  i have worked on or have seen in flight, just about everything.  i worked in the software and electronic engineering field assisting engineers with design and testing.

it was early afternoon and clear with no wind.  i was in the back yard and heard a very low frequency hum.  looking north, i saw a 4 foot high shiny metallic sphere that would pass directly overhead.  i thought that a weather balloon was about to crash in my back yard.  i moved 15 feet westward, while watching the very slow moving sphere.  i noticed no loss in altitude.  it would pass 5 feet over my home, but headed directly at the tv antenna mast.  i looked for anything flying in the sky.  i thought, ���there goes the antenna.���  observing from the front and side that it was a complete sphere, but i had no idea how it could fly.  it was moving so slow.  approaching the back part of the house, it stopped for a split second, but continued the very low frequency hum.  then, i saw the sphere move straight up, slowly.  i thought, ���this is a genuine unidentified flying object.���   my first thought, ���it is a omnidirection receiving probe.���  similar to an ocean probe observing sea life.  i was in awe of this engineering masterpiece.  i was scanning my memories to explain that straight up maneuver.  i had no answers.

the sphere moved straight up, until 5 feet above the antenna.  it stopped for a split second and moved south.  over the front yard, it stopped for a split second and moved straight down.  10 feet above the house it stopped for a split second, then continued south.  seeing this craft���s engineering drawings and manuals would be an overwhelming event.

i ran to the front west side.  it came to the power lines and made the same 90 degree maneuvers.  up, over, down, about to tree level, continuing south.  it was flying an exact southern path.  i thought of driving to follow the sphere, but could not predict a west or east change in direction.  it was hard to follow as it disappeared into the trees.  i went back to the patio and sat down.  i had been a nature study for aliens somewhere in space.

a time warp opening and closing at 10 year intervals or alien research funds only available every 10 years.  i can hardly wait for 2011.
content.summary: 4 foot sphere going to tv mast. made 90 degree turns up over and down antenna. same manuver at south power lines.

content.detailedDescription: Playing golf with my buddies, and all three of us saw this red object in the sky.  it looked to be at about 10000 feet.  it reminded me of an airplane, but it was not moving, it was pointing up, instead of horizontal to the horizon.  saw it for about 15 minutes, then the last time we looked up it was gone.  played golf again the next day, and a woman i've never met, who was playing golf at a different golf course in a neighboring town said she also so the red object in the sky when she was golfing 5/24 as well.  it was easy to notice because the sky was blue with white clouds, and this object was vividly red, so it stood out against the sky.
content.summary: Red, shaped like an airplane pointing up.  did not move. others saw it too.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at the jefferson monticello at charlottesville virginia. we were  walking the flower garden of the plantationat about 11:30 am. taking pictures of the grounds, then taking pictures of the jefferson home.  when i down loaded the pictures i noticed something strange in the pictures. very out of the ordinary. it looks like a pink teddy bear riding a pink snake, with the arms of the teddy bear pointed up. when i took the picture i don't recall seeing this in the air before. i didn't see any balloons in the air as we were walking. any help would be great.

thanks
content.summary: Pink teddy bear riding a snake in mid air?

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting in my back yard watching birds.  when 2 moving objects caught my attention, moving from west to east, but i was looking north as they entered my view.
 at first, i thought it was some debris floating by, round, and white in color.  what was odd, was that they were moving in exact distance from each other, and in the same direction.  they slowed down to a stop, and i ran inside to get my binoculars that i use for looking at stars.
  when i came back, i could only see with my eye, one of the objects staying stationary.
  i looked up with my binoculars, and could see the one i saw with my eye.  but now, i could see the second one, and just then, a third and fourth joined, and they all stopped.
  when i first saw the first one with the binoculars.  i could see that there was a glowing pinkish neon light, sort of round, faded at the edges.
  behind, i could see there was some kind of structure, off to the left of the light.  it was sort of bell shaped, with the neon ball of light, just to the right of center, so i could see the outline behind it to the left.  all of them looked like this in shape.
  as i was looking back and forth, between them.  i noticed that they "all' had a neon pinkish ball of light.  but the first one. had now changed to neon green.
  they were all stopped, but at different distances from each other.
  i was so excited, i called my boyfriend who was at work, and was only on the phone for about a minute.
  when i looked back up.  i could see with my eye, nothing.
  but with the binoculars, i could see only 2 now.  one with pink light, and one with a green neon light.
  when i adjusted my position with the binoculars, i could only see one with a pink light left.  it would be visible with my eye one moment, and then with the binoculars only the next.  
 it finally faded out.  after a minute or so, i could no longer see anything.
 when they all were moving into view when i first saw them.  they were moving slowly, then came to a stop.  they never moved at any fast rate of speed, only faded out.
  i scanned the whole area, that was outlined by the trees, but i could no longer see anything.
  the whole sighting was, maybe 5 minutes or so.
  i have seen lights before, above santa fe during the evening.  they would just come on, and go out.  with no movement.  almost like turning a flashlight off and on.  they would just come into view as i was watching the night sky.
   this makes my 6th ufo experience/sighting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 lights observed above santa fe, nm during afternoon.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv in my living room and i got a very strange feeling. whenever i get a strange feeling i always go and look out a window. i went and looked out my side door when i saw what i thought was maybe an animal running across the street behing trees toward the left side of me. i live out in the country so there are always loose dogs and deer running around. i then turned my attention to the right side and there is a light pole across my driveway and power lines in a ditch beside the road. i saw this thing, its so hard to explain. at first i thought it was the web of a spider with light shining off of it. then it got bigger and closer. it was this little oval looking thing about the size of a dinner plate. i know it sounds crazy i questioned my sanity after i saw it, i still am. it was going up about as high as the light pole and power lines and back down to the ground across the street like it would touch the ground for a second then go back up. then it would zip to the right, then to the left, then back up and back down and so forth. it looked like it was going back and forth over the road. at times it would just hover there and not move at all then it would move quickly to the left or right. it made no sound at all. i kept coming up with logical explanations in my mind of what it could be, then it would move in a way that what i was thinking of couldnt. it was like it was reading my mind. it would never tilt in any direction, just move all around. i would have grabbed a camera but i was so terrified i didnt even think of a camera untill afterward. it had 3 points of light on the top of it, kind of like a twinkling star or when light hits metal and the light reflects off of it. it was like it knew i was there, and knew i was watching it. during the time i was watching it i would rub my eyes, wipe the window off, just to make sure i was really seeing this. i watched it for about 5 minutes just frozen in fear. finally i started yelling for my fiance to come look who was back in my daughters bedroom playing with our kids. it took him a minute to come and when he did i had him look out the window with me and it was gone. i stayed up untill 5am constantly looking out the window but it never came back. but when i would go back to look out the window i would feel lightheaded but i didnt at all when i was watching it. i am the biggest scardy cat of pretty much everything. i was very shooken up by this. i just wish i could come up with something to explain what it was. it scares me to death thinking that something is out there.
content.summary: Very small oval like craft beside my house moving in all directions, back and forth over the street.

content.detailedDescription: My kids and i were outside stargazing when we noticed that one of the stars that appeared across the street over a tree line had begun changing colors rapidly. i grabbed my binoculars to zoom in on it and could see that indeed these were lights, stars do not have lights around them, the colors were ranging from red, blue, white, and green. then my son noticed that there was another one to our immediate left doing the same exact thing. again i looked and yes there were two of them. they were far off. we've had a lot of activity in the night sky that we have seen but nothing as spectacular as the light show we saw last night. we watched as they hovered and slowly made movements and then disappeared altogether.
content.summary: Two hovering star like discs

content.detailedDescription:
Can you email me with an answer?
these 2 discs have been jetting, dicing all
over the sky just above me for 5+hours now
and there are two planes whose wingspans are
pretty wide yet thin as pencils who have been
circling the exact same area for the same amount
of time with the exception of about an hour
maybe to refuel. im always looking at the sky
as the whole back wall of my apt is windows & ive
never seen planes like these not have i seen things
that look like discs. the discs are cutting left &

content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 2 of them that appear to be black

content.detailedDescription:
Vacationing in fiesta key koa resort in the florida keys (near marathon) sometime in the 1980's. can't remember the year. sitting at waters edge in evening with mother-in-law looking out at the stars. one star started moving and came in much closer to us but still far off in the sky. i'd say it came to about 1/2 mile to 1 mile away. it stopped and my mil and i looked at each other because we knew this was something strange because if it was an airplane it wouldn't just stop dead. i felt there was an intelligence to it. after sitting there for probably less than a minute, it took off at a north east angle in the sky at an incredible rate of speed, nothing like i had ever seen before. no aircraft or technology that i know about could maneuver like this. my mil and i again looked at each other and knew we had just seen a ufo. it almost felt as though it knew we were watching and then took off. i'm not sure if we were facing north,south, east or west though. 

i wouldn't have believed it if i hadn't seen it for myself. i guess why i felt i knew this was a ufo was because of the rate of acceleration and maneuvering. i never really believed in ufo's before but i've noticed more reporting and discussion about it recently and decided to register my sighting.
content.summary: Bright light in sky, star like. came in close, stopped for several seconds then took off at angle, high speed

content.detailedDescription: Was driving down the road when i saw a bright object, it zipped around then came to a halt for a few seconds, suprised i was able to take a pic with my cameraphone, no flash was used.
content.summary: Pulsating star like appearance

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on deck and began observing numerous star-like shapes forming different patterns. at times they stayed stationary and other times seemed to form patterns that became one. we noticed these objects because of the clarity of the evening and became fascinated over there patterns and movement.The experience was enthralling and went on for approx 2 hours.After watching with binoculars, all objects just disappeared. interesting, that i also observed three airforce jets, in the sky during this experience.
content.summary: 15-19 starlike objects were above home forming unusual patterns and varying speeds

content.detailedDescription:
This happened 8 years ago. my family and i were driving to florida. it was approximately 5-5:30am. my kids were sleeping in the backseat, my wife was awake in the front seat. i had stopped just pass an overpass to relieve myself as there was hardly any traffic that early. it was a saturday morning. as i was standing behind the car, i noticed this very bright light in the sky. it was approximately as high as an airliner and did look like a star. however, i am very honest when i say this. as i stood there, this light flew down to about 50ft above me. it made no sound. i don't remember there being any kind of light on the ground from this. i don't know why, but i stood there looking at it. just as quickly as it flew down above me, it shot back up and out of sight. 

i got back into the car and left. that's what i don't understand about myself. i drove to cincinnati and never mentioned this to my wife until we stopped for gas. i explained to her what i saw. she didn't really believe me. i wasn't really that upset.

i have never talked about it with anyone other than my wife. a year ago, i read someone had the same type of encounter. 

i can't say what it was. this is the only time i've ever seen a ufo.
content.summary: A very bright light
